class.name: com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.administrative.domain.DistributionProtocolRequirement
class.query: select dpr.id, sum(i.quantity) from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.administrative.domain.DistributionProtocolRequirement dpr, com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.administrative.domain.DistributionOrderItem i join i.specimen s where dpr.dp.id = :dpId and i.order.distributionProtocol.id = :dpId and i.order.status = 'EXECUTED' and dpr.specimenType = s.specimenType and dpr.anatomicSite = s.tissueSite and dpr.pathologyStatus = s.pathologicalStatus group by s.specimenType, s.tissueSite, s.pathologicalStatus, dpr.id, i.quantity
